duties_responsibilities.duty: Work as a co-teacher in urban classrooms under the guidance of expert faculty, receiving regular feedback.
Develop skills and effectiveness in teaching through practice and training.
Manage own classroom and work alongside experienced teachers during year one.
Participate in mentoring and support programs tailored to your needs.
Combat racial and socioeconomic inequality by teaching students in districts that need qualified teachers the most.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Education or related field (Master's preferred)
